scripts.build: cd node_modules/prebid.js && npm install && gulp build --adapters list-of-adapters.json
scripts.setup-prebid: rm -rf node_modules && npm install && cd node_modules/prebid.js && npm install && gulp build --adapters list-of-adapters.json && mkdir -p ../../prebid && cp build/dist/prebid.js ../../prebid/prebid.min.js
scripts.build-prebid: cd node_modules/prebid.js && gulp build --adapters list-of-adapters.json && cp build/dist/prebid.js ../../prebid/prebid.min.js
